mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Parking (phoneNumber, methodID, parkingName, description, images, address, latitude, longitude, pricing, park, status) VALUES (#{phoneNumber}, #{methodID}, #{parkingName}, #{description}, #{images}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{pricing}, #{park}, "1");
mapper.select: SELECT parkingID, phoneNumber, methodID, parkingName, description, images, address, latitude, longitude, pricing, park, status FROM Parking where parkingID = #{parkingID};
